definition: to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack

sentences.english: In addition it will meet some difficulties in imposing tax to the E-business.
sentences.chinese: 此外在对电子商务的征税中也会遇到一些问题。

sentences.english: However, the income tax-policy and new taxation issued in 1993 have been rationally and easily operated on.
sentences.chinese: 1993年，芬兰开始实行按实际收入征税的新税制。
应就垃圾食品的消费征税。

sentences.english: Congress may amend the proposed tax bill.
sentences.chinese: 议会可能会修正提议的征税法。

sentences.english: Recently, people have become very sensitive about rumors of taxing online businesses.
sentences.chinese: 最近，人们已经变得对网上贸易征税的话题非常敏感。

sentences.english: He then urged Americans to raise taxes on the rich like himself.
sentences.chinese: 他还促使美国政府提高对像他这样的富豪的征税。

sentences.english: It incited the government to impose tax on all of the immigrants.
sentences.chinese: 它怂恿政府向所有移民征税，一个也不能豁免。

sentences.english: No tax should be levied in the Kingdom without the consent of the Great Council .
sentences.chinese: 不经市政会同意，国王不得任意征税。

sentences.english: No, I haven't got any dutiable things with me.
sentences.chinese: 不，我没有带任何需要交应征税的东西。

sentences.english: What is the difference between a taxidermist and a tax collector ?
sentences.chinese: 标本剥制员与征税员有何不同呢？

sentences.english: It is an awesome power to be able to tax the biggest and most prosperous economy in the world.
sentences.chinese: 向世界上最大和最繁荣的经济体征税的权力不可小觑。

sentences.english: Why would it be wrong in principle to tax the rich to help the poor?
sentences.chinese: 为何向富人征税救济穷人在原则上是错的？

sentences.english: Private property rights and the right to tax the country throughout the conflict has always been the state's tax.
sentences.chinese: 私人财产权与国家征税权的冲突贯穿于国家税收始终。

sentences.english: Collection incentives for cross-border trade are eroded.
sentences.chinese: 对跨境贸易的征税动机遭到破坏。

sentences.english: The Whiskey Rebellion occurred because of taxes levied on alcohol made from corn.
sentences.chinese: 那场威士忌酒反抗运动源于对来自谷物的酒被征税。

sentences.english: Tax fight escalates into Zhejiang riot as 28 are detained .
sentences.chinese: 浙江征税群体性事件28人被拘通报称得到控制。

definition: not liable to taxation (of monastery, imperial family etc)/tax free/duty free (shop)
